text: إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ يَعْلَمُ مَا يَدْعُونَ مِن دُونِهِۦ مِن شَىْءٍ ۚ وَهُوَ ٱلْعَزِيزُ ٱلْحَكِيمُ

translation.en.sahih: Indeed, Allah knows whatever thing they call upon other than Him. And He is the Exalted in Might, the Wise.
translation.id.indonesian: Sesungguhnya Allah mengetahui apa saja yang mereka seru selain Allah. Dan Dia Maha Perkasa lagi Maha Bijaksana.
